content.query:
USE costmgmt
GO

CREATE OR ALTER VIEW VM_Utilization_Hourly_Metrics_Past_Three_Months
AS

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/metrics/vm-utilization-aggregates/vm_cpu_agg_hourly_past_3_months.parquet/',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
